thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 28 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF- Zhejiang Zhengyuan Zhihui Technology sees 2017 net profit down 0 pct to 12 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Zhejiang Zhengyuan Zhihui Technology sees 2017 net profit down 0 pct to 12 pct

organizations.name: zhejiang zhengyuan zhihui technology co ltd

text:
Jan 29(Reuters) - Zhejiang Zhengyuan Zhihui Technology Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to decrease by 0 percent to 12 percent, or to be 40.3 million yuan to 45.8 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 45.8 million yuan
* Says that decreased government subsidy and increased research and development costs as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/RaSWRo
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
